name: Karl Marx
what_did:
Karl Marx studied how people work, earn money, and live in society.
He believed that poor workers were treated unfairly and that one day they would rise up and change things.
He wrote a book called *The Communist Manifesto* to share his ideas.
why_matters:
Marx’s ideas have had a huge effect on history and politics.
Many revolutions and governments in the 20th century were inspired by his thoughts on equality and workers’ rights.
Even today, people still debate and discuss his influence.

questions.q: What did Marx believe about workers?

options: He helped start World War II

fun_fact: Karl Marx once worked as a journalist and had to move countries many times because of his political ideas.
